title: Top IT firms TCS, Infosys, TechM face flurry of GST notices
description: Tax experts say unlike Income Tax, IT companies have to do their GST registration for every state where they have opened their offices and branches. These orders are all related to cases of FY20, whose due date was on August 31, 2024, and thus the reasons for a flurry of notices before the due date. In some cases, IT firms also delayed their filings with BSE because of the coincidence of weekend falling on last monthâ€™s end.
content: Over the past six to seven weeks, top IT companies, such as Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, Tech Mahindra and LTIMindtree, have seen a raft of penalty and tax orders from GST departments across the country.
